Headline: #49 Western Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/Adams
ShortDescription: Northbound 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Congress Park Way, Damen, Warren, and Western, due to street blockage near Western/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Congress Park Way, Damen, Warren, and Western, due to street blockage near Western/Adams.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
